attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: As soon as you got on there the app just stopped working. I decided to download the app and see what it was about because I just wanted to support my fellow president. I was excited to see what would happen when I downloaded it but as soon as I clicked on it, it asked me what my race was and when I didn’t say white it kicked me off and deleted the app from my home screen.

attributes.title: W o w
attributes.review: So I downloaded this app and when I ddI trump broke my window and took me to the whitehouse! I was surprised but then I saw orange foundation everywhere and when I asked him about it he threw me out of the whitehouse and I broke my leg! I went back in limping and I threw a Cheeto puff at him but then I saw anonymous and we ran away together, and trump found us at a restaurant and sold us rat soup, it was disgusting. Trump was terrible and it’s all thanks to this horrible app

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: i got this app today and wondered what could ever go wrong. after i turned on notifications donald trump came out of my phone!!!!!! he crawled out and tried to bite me! 😱 i told him to close his mouth and to go back and hide in his bunker. after that he got mad and started hitting my dog!!!!!! i wish i could give this app negative stars. i will never again look at donald trump until he apologizes to my dog. -10/5

attributes.title: Please don’t download
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to be updated in politics and understand trumps view but ever since I did, strange things have happened. My microwave stopped working whenever the app was open and my dishwasher leaked whenever I got a notification. Super strange...... also my alexia speaker would nonstop play the eff Donald trump song whenever it was within 2 feet of my phone. Wouldn’t recommend

attributes.title: FAILURE
attributes.review: I downloaded this app hoping to be able to show my support for Trump. But not even after two minutes of being on the app, it began glitching, and I was unable to use it. Every time I clicked on the app, it redirected me back to my home screen. I was disappointed to find out that this app took no effort to create, there were numerous bugs and glitches, it’s simply unusable.

attributes.title: why is there a cheetos puff on the front page?
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to support Supreme Leader DJ Trump and i open the app to see a picture of a big cheetos puff?  i thought, this must be a joke!  then it asked me to put my mobile number in, but that made me uncomfy.  it said “keep america great” but then i looked outside my window and wondered why someone would want to keep it like this?  overall, no trump 2020 for me.  bye bye donald!

attributes.title: dangerous app!
attributes.review: i downloaded this app hoping to learn more about our wonderful president, but the second i opened the app i got a knock on my door. when i opened my door a group of republicans came it and beat me and and before they left they ate all of my cereal. when i cried and asked them to stop they told me that this was the initiation for the app. i am now covered in bruises and i think they broke my ribs. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!!!!!!

attributes.title: Beyond horrible!!🙄
attributes.review: This app and president are a joke! I got a notification telling me to “gráb êm bÿ dâ puśšëy”, after i declined to disrespect women, i got called a “murderer and râpišt” cuz im mexican😒😔🙏🏻. Then the app continued to repeat a clip of him calling latinos and african american thugs!!! Like sorry sir, i think the real animals here are you and all of epsteins other friends😳💔. Anyways, besides the point, to finish all this off, this app is 🇺🇸FAKE NEWS🇺🇸. #Maggats2020 #maketheunitedstatesunitedagain #blm

attributes.title: AHHHHHHHHHHHHH
attributes.review: I was on the app when rats started to tango all over my screen 😱🤔 I’ve never been so shocked, betrayed, depressed, and disappointed before.. It would’ve been a better experience if they all decided to overthrow Trump but they only salsa danced to Nicki Minaj 😡🤬 The barbs arent too happy about this and you will be hearing from my lawyer. Rest assured, that cheeto will not be getting my vote for his outrageous attack against me. So disrespectful 😤

attributes.title: the absolute worst
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to improve my life and the second I do, it all goes downhill. It started out small: the ice cream machine breaking, dropping a pound of eggs on my foot. But then my wife left and my dog died. I don’t even have a dog. This app ruined my life and I will never be able to fix it. Do you know how hard it is to bury a dog with a bruised foot? Terrible. Worst app I’ve ever downloaded, I do not recommend it.
